mapper.insert: insert into ecs_order (order_id, order_type, handover_id, goods_name, goods_weight, mailer, mailing_address, receiving_address, order_status, mailer_phone, consignee, consignee_phone, start_city, midpoint_city, end_city, shipping_price, distribution_price, transpory_price, total_price, vehicle_id, remark ) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{handoverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mailer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mailingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receivingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mailerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consigneePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midpointCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shippingPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{distributionPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transporyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update ecs_order set order_type = #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, handover_id = #{handoverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_weight = #{goodsWeight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mailer = #{mailer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mailing_address = #{mailingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, receiving_address = #{receivingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_status = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mailer_phone = #{mailerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee = #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee_phone = #{consigneePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_city = #{startCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midpoint_city = #{midpointCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_city = #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipping_price = #{shippingPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, distribution_price = #{distributionPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, transpory_price = #{transporyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehicle_id = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select order_id, order_type, handover_id, goods_name, goods_weight, mailer, mailing_address, receiving_address, order_status, mailer_phone, consignee, consignee_phone, start_city, midpoint_city, end_city, shipping_price, distribution_price, transpory_price, total_price, vehicle_id, remark from ecs_order where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select order_id, order_type, handover_id, goods_name, goods_weight, mailer, mailing_address, receiving_address, order_status, mailer_phone, consignee, consignee_phone, start_city, midpoint_city, end_city, shipping_price, distribution_price, transpory_price, total_price, vehicle_id, remark from ecs_order
